sentences.en: Alan was irritable, and very evidently in a nervy state.
sentences.cn: 艾伦很急躁，很明显他处于紧张不安的状态。

sentences.en: Aunt Alexandra was positively irritable on the Lord's Day.
sentences.cn: 每蓬星期日亚历山德拉姑妈就很容易发火.

sentences.en: Dick became morose and irritable , with the strain, Mary curiously silent.
sentences.cn: 这紧张的情形使得迪克忧烦急躁起来, 而玛丽却是沉默得出奇.

sentences.en: During the rut, the male deer can be very irritable.
sentences.cn: 在发情期间, 公鹿可能很易怒.

sentences.en: He flew into rages over nothing, seemed unbearably raw and irritable.
sentences.cn: 他会无缘无故大发雷霆,粗暴生硬, 简直叫人受不了.

sentences.en: He gets irritable when he's got toothache.
sentences.cn: 他牙一疼就很容易发脾气.

sentences.en: He was irritable and sometimes jabbed his stick into his servant's face.
sentences.cn: 他脾气暴躁,有时用手杖戳佣人的脸.

sentences.en: He wasn't irritable or snappy or anything, just slightly perplexed.
sentences.cn: 他并不是爱发火或爱起急什么的，他只是有点困惑。

sentences.en: Irritable bowel syndrome seems to affect more women than men.
sentences.cn: 女性比男性更易患肠易激综合征。

sentences.en: Jo was tired, irritable, and depressed.
sentences.cn: 乔疲惫暴躁，而且情绪低落。

sentences.en: She was irritable when she was unhappy.
sentences.cn: 她不高兴时,容易发脾气.

sentences.en: Teething can be painful and make your baby irritable.
sentences.cn: 长牙会很难受，婴儿会烦躁不安。

sentences.en: The sweat ran into Martiner's eyes. He was irritable and impatient.
sentences.cn: 马丁内兹汗水都流进了眼里, 心里毛焦火燎的.

sentences.en: They may feel tired and though outwardly calm, can be irritable.
sentences.cn: 他们或许会感到疲惫，虽然外表看似没事，但可能很容易发火。

sentences.en: Yeh - yeh probably wasn't always such an irritable old stick, thought Chuehhui.
sentences.cn: “爷爷不见得生来就是古板不近人情的罢.”他心里这样想.

trans.tran_cn: 易怒的，急躁的，过敏的，应激性的，毛躁
